title: Kodomo no Omocha
overview: Sana Kurata is a cheerful, popular and energetic eleven-year-old child actress with an extremely overprotective agent, a mother who is an eccentric award-winning author, and has a burning desire to do be a good student. However, the antics of the boys in her class make learning impossible, according to Sana, and in her eyes, Akito Hayama, an aloof boy, is the worst offender of them all. A junior-high war of the sexes ensues, and Sana eventually realizes through the chaos that Hayama may not be the "devil boy" she's made him up to be.
